short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No need to install extensions for every small task when a web app can do it too.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
UnExtension smartly matches your current browsing context to useful web tools. For example, it shows a link to a thumbnail app when you're on YouTube.

GitHub repo:
https://github.com/mefengl/webapp-finder
